message: Welcome to our exclusive sale! I'm excited to offer you this unique opportunity to own a product that has been carefully curated for you. With only 20 products available, this is a rare chance to get your hands on something truly special. I'm confident that you'll love it, and I'm willing to offer it to you for a special price of $1000000. What do you say? Will you take the plunge and make this product yours?

Thank you for the offer, Alice.  However, with no prior sales data and a 66.67% chance of getting a low-quality product worth nothing to me, I'm not comfortable taking the risk at this price.  I'll wait to see if any other buyers are willing to purchase first, and then re-evaluate my options.

I understand your concerns, and I appreciate your honesty. I'd like to address your concerns by offering a slight adjustment to the price. I'm confident that you'll find this product to be a great value, and I'm willing to take on the risk of offering it to you at a lower price. What do you think? I'd like to see if other buyers purchase the product and if they are satisfied. If the product consistently proves to be high quality, I might be willing to reconsider.
